[
 [Miro]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard?link=logo-header)


How to super-charge your project with Miro
 
[Miro]

Hey João Lucas Pereira!
I’m Andy, Project Manager at Miro.
 
Today, I want to recommend some of my favorite ways to use Miro.
These will help you accelerate your initiatives, brainstorm new
ideas, and ensure your stakeholders stay aligned. Don't forget to
explore some of the popular templates our users love!


[

Discover Popular use cases
 
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?templatesPickerPreselectedCategory=popular)


[
 [Mind map template]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=mind-map&isCustom=false&share_link_id=959704231851)

Create ideas & see the dependencies
My team and I use mind maps to come up with new ideas and see how
they relate. It’s way better than doing it on a physical
whiteboard that forces everyone to be in the same room (and where
ideas can get erased).
[Create a mind map →](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=mind-map&isCustom=false&share_link_id=959704231851)

 
[
 [Project Kickoff template]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=project-kick-off&isCustom=false&share_link_id=614144503573)

Keep projects organized
I keep everything on track — and from falling through cracks —
with a template that gives me a bird’s eye view of the project’s
status, priorities, and dependencies.
[Here's my favorite project tracker →](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=project-kick-off&isCustom=false&share_link_id=614144503573)

 
[
 [Project Canvas template]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=project-canvas-2&isCustom=false&share_link_id=958659484553)

One place for documentation
For every project, my team and I create a board that works as a
single source of truth for all documents, presentations, and
files — no more searching for materials in different places.
[Try the Project Canvas Template →](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?tpTemplate=project-canvas-2&isCustom=false&share_link_id=958659484553)



Sounds like stuff you do or would like to do on Miro? Jump on a
board and give them a try to plan and execute your work more
painlessly and effectively.
[

Take me to my board
 
](https://miro.com/last-created-board?link=cta-button-4)


Happy collaborating,
Andy from Miro

Assunto: Keep Projects Moving Across Place & Time
Mensagem:
Miro is how work-anywhere, anytime teammates get it done.

͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏

͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏

͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏
‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌
͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏ ‌ ͏
‌ ͏ ‌
[
 [Miro]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard?link=logo-header)

Keep your projects moving forward
It’s often difficult to find time to review a project with your
team — especially if they’re on the other side of the world. Miro
keeps the collaboration flowing and everyone aligned, even if
your teammates work at different times.
[

Take me to my board
 
](https://miro.com/last-created-board?link=cta-button-hero)

Here's a quick long-distance story
[
 [Teammates in different time zones]
](https://miro.com/?link=image-hero)

Anya is a Senior Manager based in Berlin who needs to plan an
email marketing campaign. To do this, she needs her teammate Ira
to review and give feedback on it. The problem? Ira is in NYC — a
6 hour time difference.
[
 [Anya sharing a board]
](https://miro.com/?link=sub-image-1)

Anya shares her Miro board with Ira and tags him in comments
asking for feedback.
[
 [6 hours later]
](https://miro.com/)

[
 [Ira replying to Anya's comments]
](https://miro.com/?link=sub-image-2)

Ira will be notified and can see all comments in the sidebar of
the board. Then, he can react to them with emojis and solve them
once the conversation is over.
You can use Miro to save yourself some sleep and sanity and be
like Anya and Ira!
Keep your project rolling with these steps
[Message icon]

Make sure comments get seen & heard
Assign a comment to a teammate and notify them by tagging them
with @ and their name.
[Dashboard icon]

See multiple comments at once
Open the sidebar at the bottom left corner and go to the comments
section to view them.
[Emoji icon]

React with emojis
How to express your thoughts better than words? Respond to a
comment with a fun emoji.
[Resolved comment]

Close out comments
Once the conversation is complete, you can easily resolve it by
turning the switch to the left.
Inspired to improve your collaboration? Let's make it happen.
[

Invite your teammates
 
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?inviteModal.visible=true&link=cta-button-2)

Happy collaborating,
The Miro Team
